issue.title: Concern about short seed vectors

discussion.p: Short seed vectors of 32-bit quantities all result in different states. However this is not true of seed vectors of 16-bit (or smaller) quantities. For example these two seeds

blockquote.pre: unsigned short seed = {1, 2, 3}; unsigned short seed = {1, 2, 3, 0};

discussion.p: See N2391 and N2423 for some further discussion.

resolution.p: Adopt the proposed resolution in N2423.

issue.note: Kona (2007): The LWG adopted the proposed resolution of N2423 for this issue. The LWG voted to accelerate this issue to Ready status to be voted into the WP at Kona.
